title: Survivor Idle Run
description: Survivor Idle Run is an idle clicker game where you must survive the zombie apocalypse and become the ultimate hero! Take control of your character and battle against hordes of flesh-eating zombies. Along the way, summon powerful allies to fight alongside you and merge them to create even stronger allies. Want to speed up the action? Click to enter fever mode and take down enemies at lightning speed! With idle gameplay, your hero will keep fighting even when you’re away. Are you ready to take on the undead and save the world? Join the adventure now and become the ultimate survivor! Discover new allies so your hero won’t have to face the zombie apocalypse alone! Summon allies to help you in battle and watch as they change in looks and strengths as you progress through the game. Will you choose to fight alongside cowboys, ninjas, gangsters, or other powerful allies? Merge three allies to create a stronger one and unlock even more powerful characters as you reach new milestones. With each new ally, you’ll gain a unique advantage in the fight against the undead. Join the adventure now and discover your new favorite allies. Survive the relentless zombie apocalypse and become the ultimate hero!
